name: Verify UI Settings Persistence
description: Validates that UI settings are properly saved and persist across game sessions.
testObjective: Ensure settings persistence works correctly and settings are only applied when saved.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Game is running with default settings

steps.action: Open settings menu and change a setting (e.g., audio volume)
steps.expected: Setting visually changes in the UI
Setting reverts to previous value or shows unsaved state

steps.action: Reopen settings and change a setting again

steps.expected: Previously saved settings persist after game restart

postconditions: Settings only apply when Save is clicked
